title: Penguin Loves Mev in the UK
original_name: 펭귄 러브스 메브 in the UK
sinopse:
Penguin is a Korean cartoonist who got married to an English man Mev. Sometimes they are faced with cultural differences, but they never fail to put a smile on each other's face. Follow their love story with this comic!

(Source: LINE Webtoon)
